previewArticle.title: DC United vs. Alajuelense | CONCACAF Champions League Match Preview

recapArticle.title: DC United 2, Alajuelense 1 | CONCACAF Champions League Match Recap

timelineItems.comment: First Half begins.
Chris Korb (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense).

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Not gonna say the Alajuela fans outnumber #DCU's, but they sure our loud. Very respectable traveling crew. #CCL

timelineItems.name: Brian Joyce
timelineItems.text: #MLSCBA agreed, now time for #DCU to pull off a miracle in #SCCL #VamosUnited

timelineItems.name: Nicholas Murray
timelineItems.text: Now, looking forward to Fabian Espindola's hat trick tonight. #Vamos #DCU #SCCL

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Alajuelense. Ariel Rodríguez tries a through ball, but Jose Ortiz is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Jordan Allan
timelineItems.text: At what point do the cards come out? #DCU #CCL

timelineItems.name: Andrew
timelineItems.text: Standard #concacaf soccer from LDA so far. #diving #timewasting #complaining #dcunited #CONCACAFChampionsLeague

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Armando Alonso.
Attempt missed. Bobby Boswell (D.C. United) header from the centre of the box is high and wide to the right. Assisted by Fabian Espindola with a cross following a corner.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: DeLeon playing well right now #dcu #mls #ccl

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  Alajuelense. Conceded by Steve Birnbaum.

timelineItems.name: Bill Reese
timelineItems.text: Warmer temperatures have thawed what was a frozen RFK pitch… and it is NOT holding up. #CCL

timelineItems.name: Loren T
timelineItems.text: Wow, the rain is coming down in DC. Tough conditions for DC United/Alajuelense match #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Porfirio Lopez (Alajuelense) right footed shot from the centre of the box is saved in the bottom right corner. Assisted by Ronald Matarrita with a cross.

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Great distribution by Hamid there, starting a counter #dcu #mls #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Jairo Arrieta (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Porfirio Lopez (Alajuelense).

timelineItems.name: Pablo A. Ortiz
timelineItems.text: 15 minutes in: Alajuelense is not impressive defensively. Fast-paced team that tries to run over its opponent. #IMFC #CCL

timelineItems.name: Tim Weaver
timelineItems.text: Dismal crowd. Dismal weather. Dismal starting score. Hoping for a historic comeback. #dcu #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ariel Rodríguez (Alajuelense) right footed shot from more than 35 yards is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Leonel Peralta.
Corner,  Alajuelense. Conceded by Bill Hamid.

timelineItems.name: Ian Quillen
timelineItems.text: Steady rain here at RFK. @dcunited has some good history with these kinds of conditions, although it's been a while ... #DCU, #MLS, #SCCL

timelineItems.comment: Davy Arnaud (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Armando Alonso (Alajuelense).

timelineItems.name: Bill Reese
timelineItems.text: Alajuelense's keeper dressed as the long-lost member of The Hart Foundation #CCL http://t.co/sFSVAXzznc

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Leonel Peralta (Alajuelense).
Nick DeLeon (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Ariel Rodríguez (Alajuelense) hits the left post with a right footed shot from outside the box.
Attempt blocked. Kenner Gutierrez (Alajuelense) right footed shot from the centre of the box is blocked.
Match ends, D.C. United 2, Alajuelense 1.

timelineItems.name: CONCACAF
timelineItems.text: FINAL - @dcunited 2 (4), @ldacr 1 (6) ... #Alajuelense advances to 2nd consecutive #SCCL semifinal ... #CONCACAF #DCU #Alajuelense

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: #DCU defeats @ldacr, 2-1, but falls on aggregate in #SCCL quarterfinals, 6-4.

timelineItems.name: Matches Malone (DJ)
timelineItems.text: True heartbreak for @dcunited supporters - win, but lose #CCL

timelineItems.name: Jon Lee
timelineItems.text: CONCACAF is a tough league, but man I want to win this thing next year. #DCU #SCCL

timelineItems.comment: Attempt saved. Ronald Matarrita (Alajuelense) left footed shot from the left side of the box is saved in the bottom left corner.

timelineItems.name: The Deadlock Victim
timelineItems.text: Hamid is clutch! #CCL

timelineItems.name: • ⌨ •
timelineItems.text: Great game so far!!🔥🇺🇸 #SCCL #CCL #DCU

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: 20 minutes in. While #DCU has pushed early, Bill Hamid with a three big saves in a short stretch to keep things scoreless. #SCCL

timelineItems.name: Tom Bice
timelineItems.text: Not going to win by 3 goals if we give the ball away like that in front of our 18 #dcu #ccl

timelineItems.comment: Jose Ortiz (Alajuelense) wins a free kick in the attacking half.
Foul by Steve Birnbaum (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Astroheader
timelineItems.text: Dang props to Bill Hamid for preventing that chip from half field 😬 #DCU #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Fabian Espindola (D.C. United).
Ariel Rodríguez (Alajuelense) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jairo Arrieta (D.C. United).
Kenner Gutierrez (Alajuelense) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Ian Quillen
timelineItems.text: Conventional wisdom suggests @Alajuelense would bunker with a three goal lead. Instead they're going for kill and should be up 1-0. #SCCL

timelineItems.comment: Chris Korb (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the left wing.
Foul by Kenner Gutierrez (Alajuelense).
Attempt missed. Bobby Boswell (D.C. United) header from the centre of the box misses to the right. Assisted by Fabian Espindola.
Attempt blocked. Leonel Peralta (Alajuelense) right footed shot from outside the box is blocked. Assisted by Armando Alonso.
Attempt saved. Jose Ortiz (Alajuelense) header from the centre of the box is saved in the centre of the goal. Assisted by Leonel Peralta.

timelineItems.name: Andrew
timelineItems.text: Boswells missed 2 great chances. Have to at least test the keeper. #dcunited #CONCACAFChampionsLeague

timelineItems.comment: Armando Alonso (Alajuelense) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Perry Kitchen (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Matches Malone (DJ)
timelineItems.text: Spectacular miss! #CCL #DCUvALA

timelineItems.name: Alec F. Rivera
timelineItems.text: Bill Hamid's a top keeper because he plays like this after injury. Dykstra still has a couple ??? because of how he played last week. #CCL

timelineItems.name: James J Pepe
timelineItems.text: In a game that they need to score a bunch of goals, #DCU is proving wasteful in front of goal. #SCCL

timelineItems.name: hey_arnaldo
timelineItems.text: #Gametime #CCL #DCUnited

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Perry Kitchen (D.C. United).
Johnny Acosta (Alajuelense) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: Nick Oristian
timelineItems.text: The passes need to be more crisp. They are laying off too much. #SCCL #DCU #VamosUnited

timelineItems.name: Adrian Melville
timelineItems.text: #DCU could use Eddie Johnson tonight. Conditions geared towards launching balls into the penalty area for a tall, athletic striker #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Perry Kitchen (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Ted Meyer
timelineItems.text: #DCU having a tough time with this surface. Good thing they don't play here very much. #MLS #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Armando Alonso (Alajuelense).
Steve Birnbaum (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense).
Chris Pontius (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Alec F. Rivera
timelineItems.text: UNITED GOAL, Jairo Arrieta!!!!! They're in this! #DCU #MLS #CCL

timelineItems.name: JMazz
timelineItems.text: #DCU really needs one before half to have a legit shot at this this. #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jairo Arrieta (D.C. United).
Ariel Rodríguez (Alajuelense) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: From the press box, not sure if I'm hearing drums from the loud side or #DCU's pulse. They've got a little life left in 'em now. #MLS

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Arrieta wide open for that one from the penalty spot. #DCU up 1-0, down 5-3 on aggregate. #SCCL

timelineItems.name: Brieneke Matthes
timelineItems.text: Goalllll @dcunited!! Only need two more now!! #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Fabian Espindola (D.C. United).
Porfirio Lopez (Alajuelense) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Hand ball by Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense).

timelineItems.name: CONCACAF
timelineItems.text: In #SCCL quarterfinals, teams have come back from 1st leg deficits to advance 7 times (all Mexican sides) … #CONCACAF #DCU @dcunited

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Steve Birnbaum (D.C. United).
Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense) wins a free kick in the attacking half.

timelineItems.name: Greg Spradlin
timelineItems.text: Alright @dcunited make some history. #ccl

timelineItems.name: Bill Reese
timelineItems.text: How do we describe the surface at RFK tonight? Dead Grass Painted Green or Dirt Painted Green? #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Johnny Acosta.

timelineItems.name: Ian Quillen
timelineItems.text: I'll say this for @Alajuelense: They have the most legible numbers of any Central American team I've watched live. #SCCL

timelineItems.comment: Davy Arnaud (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Armando Alonso (Alajuelense).
Foul by Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense).
Steve Birnbaum (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: David Hillshafer
timelineItems.text: Looks like a lot of slips and dives being given as fouls by this ref. #CCL A major weakness in our region.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Steve Birnbaum (D.C. United).
Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense) wins a free kick in the defensive half.

timelineItems.name: Alec F. Rivera
timelineItems.text: Not complaining but that foul was soft. #MLS #CCL #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Delay in match Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense) because of an injury.
Delay over. They are ready to continue.
Johnny Acosta (Alajuelense) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Jairo Arrieta (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Steven Goff
timelineItems.text: Ben Olsen sent off in 44th minute. Clearly, he doesn't like the CBA terms.

timelineItems.name: Thomas Floyd
timelineItems.text: #MLS coaches now have an impressive 100 percent ejection rate in the #CCL quarterfinals.

timelineItems.name: Jason Weaver
timelineItems.text: So Ben Olsen just got sent off in their #CCL game against Alajuelense. #MLS #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Perry Kitchen (D.C. United) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense).
First Half ends, D.C. United 1, Alajuelense 0.

timelineItems.name: Lawrence Dockery
timelineItems.text: Something tells me that Ben Olsen is not the only one that's going to be sent off in this game. #CCL #DCU

timelineItems.name: Lindsay Simpson
timelineItems.text: A little rain won't stop us! @samperrie #DCU #CCL

timelineItems.name: Steven Willis
timelineItems.text: Can Montreal loan Cam Porter to DC tonight? #CCL

timelineItems.text: Alajuense fans are nice #DCUnited http://t.co/WJ4ZKy8oLR

timelineItems.text: How did Espindola miss that? #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Corner,  D.C. United. Conceded by Leonel Peralta.

timelineItems.name: Ben Chang
timelineItems.text: .@dcunited conditions wet but spirits high! #DCU #SCCL http://t.co/wpR2kH1FK6

timelineItems.comment: Nick DeLeon (D.C. United) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Foul by Johan Venegas (Alajuelense).

timelineItems.name: moses_10
timelineItems.text: Enjoying the game with the CostaRican fans! #PuraVida #Alajuelense #Selfie #DCUnited who cares if its raining!

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Davy Arnaud just tracked back 40 yards to cover for a teammate and head that ball out of danger. Age means little to that guy. #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Offside, Alajuelense. Ronald Matarrita tries a through ball, but Jose Ortiz is caught offside.

timelineItems.name: Lisandro
timelineItems.text: Weather for this #DCUnited game looks really nasty. Drenching rain! Either way, 2 more goals DC, you can do it! #MLS #CCL

timelineItems.name: Forrest Ellis
timelineItems.text: DC United players would be smart to stop fouling players. Not going to score by pushing people over. #DCU #CCL #stayfocused

timelineItems.name: The Deadlock Victim
timelineItems.text: Anyone else disconcerted by those rivulets of water dripping off the top deck in front of the camera every once in a while? #CCL #DCU

timelineItems.comment: Kenner Gutierrez (Alajuelense) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Fabian Espindola (D.C. United).

timelineItems.name: Chris Teale
timelineItems.text: Breaking: no black teabags in the #dcu media room. Source with knowledge of the situation says some media members are furious. #sccl #ccl

timelineItems.name: Samantha Quiñones
timelineItems.text: Aaaand, in to the pool. #DCUnited

timelineItems.name: Christopher
timelineItems.text: Area near the United goal line is an absolute lake, Matarrita goes for a dip. #concacafchampionsleague

timelineItems.name: Mikey Jara
timelineItems.text: I have to be honest but DC United have gotten away with so many fouls #concacafchampionsleague

timelineItems.name: DCU_Exile
timelineItems.text: LDA player wasn't even touched, then faked a head, then a leg injury. Shameful. #CCL

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Few things make my blood boil like time-wasting. Tonight is going to be a long, long night for me. #DCU #CCL

timelineItems.name: Joshua Barbieri
timelineItems.text: #ccl #dcu alajuelene look a little slower out here then at home - cold weather and grass?

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Embarassing flop by an Alajuelense player already #mls #dcu #ccl

timelineItems.name: Joe Law
timelineItems.text: CONCACAF CHAMPIONS LEAGUE Quarterfinal Leg 2 - Alajuelense at DC UNITED! VAMOS UNITED #dcunited #dc #mls #soccer

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense).

timelineItems.name: Ian Quillen
timelineItems.text: Rolfe is on for Pontius and already looking more dangerous playing in the wide left channel. #DCU still needing two more goals. #SCCL

timelineItems.name: 202cheech
timelineItems.text: #rfkstadium #dcunited

timelineItems.name: Tara
timelineItems.text: CONCACAF time!!! A little rain can't stop us!  #VamosUnited #dcunited

timelineItems.text: Perry Kitchen. Game time. #DCU #CCL

timelineItems.comment: Lineups are announced and players are warming up.

timelineItems.name: James J Pepe
timelineItems.text: DCU needs to get their second and leave themsleves about 15 minutes to get the third. #SCCL

timelineItems.name: Pablo Maurer
timelineItems.text: Massive press box upgrades at RFK: I'm using reliable wi-fi while drinking a chai tea; I had Chick-Fil-A for dinner. Also: flatscreen TV's.

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Chris Rolfe (D.C. United).
Jonathan McDonald (Alajuelense) wins a free kick on the right wing.

timelineItems.name: The Deadlock Victim
timelineItems.text: Does #DCU have any of this year's draft picks on the bench? Try putting him on! #CCL

timelineItems.name: Ray Marcham
timelineItems.text: OK...can #DCU pull off a miracle tonight? They need to win 3-0 or 4-1 to advance. #CCL

timelineItems.name: Steven Streff
timelineItems.text: Alaja supporters loud in their esta noche chants. If nothing else, the supporters from both sides should be fun tonight #SCCL

timelineItems.name: D.C. United
timelineItems.text: Big task ahead. No fear. Vamos! #SCCL #DCU

timelineItems.name: Fabien Lewis
timelineItems.text: My current status. Costa Rican #football giants #Alajuelense vs your very own #DCUnited. #dmv #dc #soccer #MLS http://t.co/en8LM7Z0Qt

timelineItems.name: Ian Quillen
timelineItems.text: Arnaud is rightly confused, but #DCU have just gotten a massive break. Card should've gone to Steve Birnbaum. Woud've been his second. #SCCL

timelineItems.name: Christopher
timelineItems.text: If there isn't a red card in the next 30 minutes, call me Eddie Johnson. #concacafchampionsleague

timelineItems.comment: Foul by Ariel Rodríguez (Alajuelense).

timelineItems.name: Nick Oristian
timelineItems.text: This referee, Lopez, has no control of this match. Players walking all over him. Get it together @CONCACAF. #VamosUnited #SCCL

timelineItems.name: AnnaLee Emmons
timelineItems.text: oh DC United, how I've missed you. #vamosunited #dcunited #soccer #championsleague

timelineItems.text: Largest #SCCL quarterfinal reversal was from a 2-goal deficit twice - 2009: @ClubSantos v @impactmontreal; 2010: @PumasMX v @CDMarathon

timelineItems.name: #DavidHaceCostaRica
timelineItems.text: Alajuela is just begging for a card in this game for diving, persistent fouls, and spikes up on tackles. #bs #dcu #ccl #vamosunited

timelineItems.text: Alajuelense goal. Things just got MUCH harder. #MLS #CCL #DCU

timelineItems.name: Ben Bromley
timelineItems.text: Not a good night for Korb #dcu #mls #ccl

timelineItems.name: Christopher
timelineItems.text: Womp womp. Honestly deserved. MLS fans will whine, but DC have been poor, and arguably the more cynical side. #concacafchampionsleague

timelineItems.name: Jeff
